title: Silver support looking for adc main
body:
Silver 5 atm after decaying and losing alot. Went from bronze to gold back to silver.

Im a positive player just want a good adc high silver/gold to climb with. 

ign J Dogga. add me im online

replies.body: you don't decay if you are below Plat 8)
I am silver II/I atm, add me and we'll duo if you would like. Jarthur121
